home.slogan: Fork It, Shape It, Make It Yours
home.description: Dive into a platform that empowers you to create and customize your own web design tools with complete control.
home.startShapingDescription: Start shaping the future of your design tool with the freedom to code your way!
home.exploreLatestProjects: Explore our latest projects and their impact
home.readyMadeLayoutsYouCanCustomizeInAFewCli: Ready-made layouts you can customize in a few clicks.

features.title: Solid React editor foundation
features.description: Start from a working canvas editor with shapes, text, images, layers, and keyboard shortcuts already wired up.

features.title: Starter stack you can extend
features.description: Basic frontend, backend API, and admin screens are included so you have a clear starting point instead of building everything from scratch.

features.title: Templates & projects out of the box
features.description: Core flows like templates, user projects, authentication, and localization are set up so you can focus on your own features.

features.title: One‑time license, ongoing updates
features.description: Pay once and get lifetime updates and a commercial license to adapt this foundation into your own editor product.

home.whyChooseUsTitle: Why builders start with this kit
home.whyChooseUsSubTitle: A graphic editor foundation that saves weeks
home.whyChooseUsDescription: You're getting a practical starting point — a working editor and boilerplate app structure — so you can skip the boring start from scratch and focus on what makes your product unique.
home.readyToMakeItYoursDescription: Join hundreds of satisfied customers and experience the foundation design tool on the market. Sign up today for exclusive deals and offers.

pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.content: The page you are looking for does not exist.

footer.quote: Ready to shape your tool your way? Explore our source code and start building today.
